CommonFields.Title: Investigation of the dispersion process of SWNTs/SC-15 epoxy resin nanocomposites
Author: Liao, Yu-Hsuan
Marietta-Tondin, Olivier
Liang, Zhiyong
Zhang, Chuck
Wang, Ben
CommonFields.Location: Department of Industrial and Manufacturing Engineering, Florida Advanced Center for Composite Technologies (FAC2T), Florida A and M University, Florida State University College of Engineering 2525 Pottsdamer Street, Tallahassee, FL 32310-6046, USA

Matrix.Description: The epoxy resin was a two-phase SC-15 epoxy resin system

Filler.Description: The SWNTs used in this study were purified

SolventAmount.description: Since it is difficult to vaporize only a limited amount of the acetone was added into the resin.

Mixing.Description: A Teflon rod was used to manually stir the mixture
Solution was added to a mortar and stirred manually.

Drying-Evaporation.Description: A full vacuum was applied to remove all solvents and trapped air

Cooling.Description: The mixture was subsequently cooled to rt

Mixing.Description: The hardener was added to the mixture and manually stirred with a Teflon rod

MoldingInfo.Description: Mixture was cast into mold and cured in an oven
Samples were post cured with a ramping speed of 0.4 C/min

ChooseParameter.Other: Samples were polished and prepared for analysis
